SELECT oi.id, oi.order_name, oi.repair_code, oi.order_code, oi.server_type, oi.money, oi.remark, oi.images, oi.status, oi.customer_id, oi.product_id, oi.staff_id, oi.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, ss.name AS serverTypeName, se.id AS evaluationFlag FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.customer_id ) LEFT JOIN service_sort ss ON (ss.id = oi.server_type) LEFT JOIN staff_evaluation se ON (se.order_code = oi.order_code) WHERE 1 = 1
AND oi.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderCode},'%')
AND oi.order_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.orderName},'%')
AND oi.status = #{orderInfo.status}
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderInfo.userName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{orderInfo.userId}
ORDER BY oi.create_date DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN order_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' )) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
SELECT COUNT(1) AS count, pi.name FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN product_info pi ON (pi.id = oi.product_id) WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY oi.product_id

SELECT oi.id, oi.order_name, oi.repair_code, oi.order_code, oi.server_type, oi.money, oi.remark, oi.images, oi.status, oi.customer_id, oi.product_id, oi.staff_id, oi.create_date, ui.name as userName, ui.phone, ss.name AS serverTypeName FROM order_info oi LEFT JOIN user_info ui ON ( ui.id = oi.customer_id ) LEFT JOIN service_sort ss ON (ss.id = oi.server_type) WHERE 1 = 1 AND oi.repair_code = #{repairCode}
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( pr.money ), 0 ) FROM payment_record pr WHERE DATE_FORMAT( pr.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND `status` = 6
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM repair_info ri WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ri.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
